```{r}
#| context: setup
library(geyser)
library(shiny)
```

## Row - Datasets {height="20%"}

### Column dataset

```{r}
datasetsInput("datasets")
```

### Column variable

```{r}
datasetsUI("datasets")
```

## Row - Plots {height="80%"}

### Column - Hist

```{r}
#| title: Basic Histogram
histInput("hist")
histOutput("hist")
histUI("hist")
```

### Column - GGhist

```{r}
#| title: GGplot2 Histogram
gghistInput("gghist")
gghistOutput("gghist")
gghistUI("gghist")
```

### Column - GGpoint

```{r}
#| title: GGplot2 Point Plot
ggpointInput("ggpoint")
ggpointOutput("ggpoint")
ggpointUI("ggpoint")
```

```{r}
#| context: server
datasets <- datasetsServer("datasets")
histServer("hist", datasets)
gghistServer("gghist", datasets)
ggpointServer("ggpoint", datasets)
```
